name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: Anyway, nobody is under any obligation to listen to me ever, BUT: Attrition is expensive, and an on-call situation that isn’t just cruise control for burnout is extremely useful for both recruiting and retaining talented engineers. 🤷🏼‍♀️
content.value:
Anyway, nobody is under any obligation to listen to me ever, BUT:

Attrition is expensive, and an on-call situation that isn’t just cruise control for burnout is extremely useful for both recruiting and retaining talented engineers.

🤷🏼‍♀️
